ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
taskDescription:
Machine translation may be a shortcut to languages you do not know (yet). Try it out for unknown languages!

Would you like to learn to write in Greek the name of the 12 Olympian Gods?

 

  1. Translate in the box the name of the 12 Olympian Gods into Greek with a machine translator: Aphrodite • Apollo • Ares • Artemis • Athena • Hades • Hephaestus • Hera • Hermes • Hestia • Poseidon • Zeus
  2. To check if the translation is correct, RETRANSLATE the Greek output into English again. Whatch our for mistakes. If there are mistakes, translate and retranslate the names separately until you have them all right. This will make you aware of the limitation of machine translators.
  3. Finally, hand write the Greek name of your favourite Olympian Gods and enjoy practicing your new Greek calligraphy skills!
